item.title: Subtitles generation with Davinci Resolve
item.description: What am I trying to learn through this experience? As a film editor, one of the most tedious and time-consuming tasks can be transcribing audio to text in order to create subtitles for your videos. While many video editing software programs, such as Adobe Premiere, have built-in transcription tools, the same feature is not always available in other programs, such as DaVinci Resolve. In order to streamline the editing process, many editors are turning to AI-powered transcription software as a solution.
